languages.text: "Сложно признать, но я согласен с негодованием Мастера дисциплины. Мы пришли, чтобы добыть информацию об изменниках, а не раскрывать наши секреты".

traits.locale_text: "Сложно признать, но я согласен с негодованием Мастера дисциплины. Мы пришли, чтобы добыть информацию об изменниках, а не раскрывать наши карты".

languages.text: "It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."
languages.original_text: "Сложно признать, но я согласен с негодованием Мастера дисциплины. Мы пришли, чтобы добыть информацию об изменниках, а не раскрывать наши секреты".

traits.locale_text: "It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."
"It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."
"It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."
"It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."
"It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."
"It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."

languages.text: "Es fällt mir nicht leicht, das zuzugeben, doch ich teile die Entrüstung der Master-at-Arms. Wir sind gekommen, um Informationen über die Verräter zu bekommen, nicht um unsere Geheimnisse preiszugeben."
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."

traits.locale_text: "Es fällt mir nicht leicht, das zuzugeben, doch ich teile die Entrüstung der Master-at-Arms. Wir sind gekommen, um Informationen über die Verräter zu bekommen, nicht um unsere Geheimnisse preiszugeben."

languages.text: «Cuesta admitirlo, pero comparto la indignación de la maestra de armas. Hemos venido a por los secretos de los traidores, no a revelar los nuestros».
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."

traits.locale_text: «Cuesta admitirlo, pero comparto la indignación de la maestra de armas. Hemos venido a por los secretos de los traidores, no a revelar los nuestros».

languages.text: 「認めるのは、しゃくだが、私もマスター・アット・アームと同じ憤りを感じている。我々は裏切り者の情報を得るためにここに来たのであって、秘密を明かしに来たわけじゃない」
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."

traits.locale_text: 「認めるのは、しゃくだが、私もマスター・アット・アームと同じ憤りを感じている。我々は裏切り者の情報を得るためにここに来たのであって、秘密を明かしに来たわけじゃない」

languages.text: “虽然我不想承认，但我确实和戒律大师一样愤慨。我们来这里是为了搜集那个叛徒的情报，不是为了泄露我们的秘密。”
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."

traits.locale_text: “虽然我不想承认，但我确实和戒律大师一样愤慨。我们来这里是为了搜集那个叛徒的情报，不是为了泄露我们的秘密。”

languages.text: « Ça me fait mal de le dire, mais je partage l'indignation de la capitaine d'armes. Nous sommes venus récolter des informations sur les traîtres, pas pour révéler nos secrets. »
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."

traits.locale_text: « Ça me fait mal de le dire, mais je partage l'indignation de la capitaine d'armes. Nous sommes venus récolter des informations sur les traîtres, pas pour révéler nos secrets. »

languages.text: "İtiraf etmesi zor olsa da Silahtar'ın öfkesini paylaşıyorum. Buraya hainlere dair bilgi toplamak için geldik, sırlarımızı açığa çıkarmaya değil."
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to admit, but I do share the Master-at-Arms's indignation. We came here to get information about the traitors, not to reveal our secrets."
